rules_text:
When Sunset Study enters, exile the top three cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn.
[i]Augmented[/i] – {5}, Sacrifice Sunset Study: Put each card exiled with Sunset Study and the top two cards of your library into your hand. This ability costs {5} less to activate if you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn.
